Article Title: 'Rats have gone into hiding': BJP's 'Pushpa' jibe at Congress after India clinches Champions Trophy
Article Text:
Pushpa samjh ke flower samjha fire hai main

NEW DELHI: The Bharatiya Janata Party ( BJP ) on Monday mocked Congress after India's Champions Trophy victory, highlighting the grand old party leader Shama Mohamed's earlier controversial comments about Rohit Sharma 's physique.Congress spokesperson Shama Mohamed had previously faced criticism for calling the Indian captain "fat" and "unimpressive."Taking to social media, BJP shared a video featuring a scene from the film Pushpa featuring the iconic dialogue, "", (Did you think I’m a flower just because you heard the name Pushpa? I am fire) captioned, "Unfit samjha kya? Superfit hai main" (Did you think I was unfit? I am super fit).The post celebrated India’s back-to-back triumphs under Sharma’s captaincy.The post was captioned, "Shameless Congress mocked and body-shamed Rohit—today, his captaincy roared so loud that these rats have gone into hiding! We will file missing complaint if these trolls are not found by morning!"BJP also shared another post about Sharma’s achievements, saying, "Under Rohit Sharma’s captaincy: Team India wins T20 World Cup 2024 and Team India wins Champions Trophy 2025 ."Following the win, Mohamed congratulated the team, including Sharma, praising his leadership and performance. In a post on social media, she wrote, "Hats off to captain Rohit Sharma who led from the front with a brilliant 76, setting the tone for victory."Mohamed's controversial comments were made on social media and quickly went viral, sparking widespread backlash. She labelled Sharma "fat for a sportsman" and claimed he was the "most unimpressive captain India has ever had," comparing him to cricketing legends like MS Dhoni, Virat Kohli, and Sachin Tendulkar. Although Mohamed deleted her posts after facing heavy criticism, she defended her remarks, insisting that she was merely commenting on Sharma's fitness, not body-shaming.BJP leaders swiftly seized on the opportunity to criticise the Congress. BJP spokesperson Shehzad Poonawalla mocked the party, saying, "Those who have lost 90 elections under the captaincy of Rahul Gandhi are calling Rohit Sharma unimpressive!" Poonawalla further lauded Sharma's achievements, including his recent T20 World Cup victory and a stellar track record as captain.Meanwhile, other BJP leaders, including Pradeep Bhandari, accused Congress of continuously opposing figures who are seen as national heroes, while Union sports minister Mansukh Mandaviya weighed in, urging political parties to avoid criticising athletes. Mandaviya called out remarks that undermine sportspeople’s dedication, labelling such comments as “shameful” and “pathetic.” He added that politicians should respect athletes, who are capable of managing their professional lives without political interference.Congress spokesperson Pawan Khera said that Mohamed had been advised to delete her posts and exercise more caution in the future. Congress MP Rajani Patil also condemned the remarks, calling body-shaming unacceptable and criticising the timing of Mohamed’s comments just before a major match.India's men's cricket team, under Rohit Sharma's leadership, triumphed in the Champions Trophy 2025, defeating New Zealand to secure their third title. Sharma’s performance, including a match-winning 76, was widely celebrated, and his leadership has been lauded by fans and experts.
Article Summary: Congress spokesperson shama mohamed had previously faced criticism for calling the indian captain "fat" and "unimpressive" bjp shared a video featuring a scene from the film pushpa featuring the iconic dialogue, "did you think i’m a flower just because you heard the name pushpa? I am fire"

Article Title: Rohit Sharma's perfect 'stump toss' stuns Dubai after India’s Champions Trophy title win - WATCH
Article Text:
Rohit Sharma (AP Photo)

Go Beyond The Boundary with our YouTube channel. SUBSCRIBE NOW!

'Not going anywhere': Rohit Sharma on retirement from ODIs after winning the Champions Trophy

India win Champions Trophy title; Rohit Sharma confirms he's not retiring

NEW DELHI: Emotions ran high for Indian skipper Rohit Sharma as he led India to a historic ICC Champions Trophy 2025 triumph in front of a packed, electrifying crowd at the Dubai International Stadium . India secured the title with a four-wicket victory over New Zealand in the final, marking their second ICC trophy in just nine months.Their previous triumph came in June 2024 when they defeated South Africa in the T20 World Cup final in Barbados.Back in Barbados, Rohit had celebrated by grabbing the Indian flag, carrying it onto the field, and planting it at the centre of the pitch.In Dubai, he recreated the iconic moment with a unique twist.After guiding India to a thrilling win, Rohit strode onto the field, stump in hand, and executed an astonishing feat. He tossed the pointed end of the stump into the ground, where it landed perfectly upright, leaving fans in awe.Rohit also put an end to speculations about his career following India’s ICC Champions Trophy triumph, asserting that he has no plans to quit the ODI format anytime soon.Since the Australia tour, questions had been swirling about Rohit's future in the team and his role as captain. However, his match-winning knock of 76 in the final against New Zealand on Sunday has silenced doubts, giving him a fresh lease on his career."I am not going to retire from this (ODI) format. Going forward please don't spread rumours," Rohit said at the post-match press conference.When asked about his future plans, Rohit responded with a reassuring statement, saying that things will remain as they are."No future plans. Jo ho raha hain, woh chalta jayega (Whatever is happening will keep continuing)," Rohit added.
Article Summary: Rohit sharma led india to a historic icc champions trophy 2025 triumph in front of a packed, electrifying crowd at the dubai international stadium. India secured the title with a four-wicket victory over new zealand in the final, marking their second icc trophy in just nine months.

Article Title: “Death of a relationship”: Taylor Swift allegedly fears Travis Kelce’s retirement decision could create challenges in their relationship
Article Text:
Image via GC

Taylor Swift is said to be grappling with issues regarding how Travis Kelce's professional decisions

Taylor Swift is said to be grappling with issues regarding how Travis Kelce's professional decisions could affect their relationship. According to sources, she is unsure of what the future holds, especially since he is weighing whether to keep playing or retire from the NFL. There are concerns that his possible retirement could lead to major shifts in their dynamic, and Swift is worried about how it could affect their connection.Taylor Swift is reported to be grappling with fears about how Travis Kelce's choices concerning his football career will impact their relationship. RadarOnline reports that the pop star is anxious about the uncertainty that lies ahead, especially as Kelce considers extending for one more season.An insider told that Swift is concerned about how their relationship dynamic will shift if Kelce chooses to retire from the NFL. The adjustment from his rigorous athletic life to a new way of living could present unexpected challenges, making her nervous about how they will handle this new chapter in their lives together.“If Travis does retire, it could drastically change his and Taylor’s lives together. He would be around far more, and who knows—she may start to get sick of him!” the source said. The couple is experiencing a mix of feelings, including a desire to spend more time together, and concerns about potential challenges. The insider noted, “They both know this can spell the death of a relationship.”Adding to the uncertainty, Marca revealed that Taylor Swift was greatly affected by the backlash she received at the Super Bowl, where she was booed by parts of the audience. What made things worse for her was that Travis Kelce did not publicly defend her at the time, which apparently left her exposed and vulnerable.Also Read: Travis Kelce's beau Taylor Swift sets historic streaming record on International Women's Day, surpassing 7.2 billion Spotify streams While Kelce considers the future of his football career, Swift is reportedly becoming more and more worried about what it might hold for their relationship in the future. His choice is no longer merely a sports decision—it's one that weighs heavily on his emotions and could be a defining factor in how their relationship continues to develop. The not knowing of what is to come has only fueled Swift's fears, which makes this the critical juncture for their relationship and lives.
Article Summary: Taylor swift is said to be grappling with issues regarding how travis kelce's professional decisions could affect their relationship. According to sources, she is unsure of what the future holds, especially since he is weighing whether to keep playing or retire from the nfl.

Article Title: Michael Vaughan acknowledges India's white-ball dominance, backs B-team to make Champions Trophy final
Article Text:
Michael Vaughan (Photo Credits: Getty Images)

Poll What Was the Key to India’s ICC Champions Trophy 2025 Final Victory? Brilliant Strategy & Execution Incredible Team Spirit

India win Champions Trophy title; Rohit Sharma confirms he's not retiring

NEW DELHI: Former England captain Michael Vaughan has heaped praise on India’s extraordinary bench strength following their historic ICC Champions Trophy victory over New Zealand on Sunday.Taking to X (formerly Twitter), Vaughan suggested that even a second-string Indian side could have reached the final.“Jaiswal, Varma, Sharma, SKY, Pant, Reddy, Sundar, Chahal, Arshdeep, Bumrah & Bishnoi… This team would have made it to the final as well IMO. The strength in Indian cricket in white-ball is off the scale,” he wrote.India, led by Rohit Sharma , secured a record third Champions Trophy title with a flawless run through the tournament, capped off by a four-wicket win over the Blackcaps in a tense final.Rohit’s authoritative 76 off 83 balls set the tone in a tricky 252-run chase, as India cruised home with an over to spare.Vaughan’s comments come in the wake of India's remarkable consistency across formats, and highlight the incredible depth of talent in Indian cricket.The list he shared includes several promising young players like Yashasvi Jaiswal , Tilak Varma , and Rinku Singh, along with experienced campaigners such as Rishabh Pant, Suryakumar Yadav , and Jasprit Bumrah ALSO SEE: White blazers and wild celebrations: Inside India’s Champions Trophy festivities While the playing XI featured seasoned performers like Virat Kohli, KL Rahul, and Jadeja, many rising stars watched from the sidelines — an indication of just how competitive India’s pool of talent has become.Kuldeep Yadav and Varun Chakravarthy choked New Zealand with spin, while Shreyas Iyer, Axar Patel, and Rahul delivered crucial contributions in the middle order.
Article Summary: India beat new zealand by four wickets to win the icc champions trophy. Former england captain michael vaughan has heaped praise on india's bench strength. Vaughan suggested that even a second-string indian side could have reached the final. India secured a record third champions trophy title with a flawless run through the tournament.

Article Title: Could Diddy’s legal troubles impact Odell Beckham Jr.'s NFL future? The former Super Bowl champion is among several defendants in the lawsuit
Article Text:
Image via AP

Could Diddy’s legal troubles impact Odell Beckham Jr.'s NFL future?

While the legal fight concerning Sean "Diddy" Combs is developing, NFL superstar wide receiver Odell Beckham Jr. has been named as a defendant in a recently filed case in the Northern District of California.The lawsuit also includes popular comedian and online personality Druski (Drew Desbordes), as well as R&B artist Jaguar Wright. But it is Beckham's purported involvement in the matter that has generated widespread public interest, bringing with it high levels of intense scrutiny and debate throughout social media and news circles.Odell Beckham Jr. last appeared in uniform with the Miami Dolphins in the 2024 NFL season, becoming his fourth club in four seasons. His season on the field was short, though, playing in only nine games and recording just nine receptions for 55 yards. Who was once considered one of the league's best wide receivers saw his career of late derailed by injury and diminishing output.In his first six seasons as a professional, Beckham was a force to be reckoned with. He surpassed 1,000 receiving yards in five of those seasons and scored 48 touchdowns, most of which came as a New York Giant.Chosen 12th overall of the 2014 NFL Draft from LSU, Beckham was a sensation right off the bat in the league. He won the NFL Offensive Rookie of the Year award and recorded three consecutive Pro Bowl selections as a household name due to highlight-reel plays.Following his stint with the Giants, Odell Beckham Jr. signed with the Cleveland Browns in 2019, the last year he recorded over 600 receiving yards. Unfortunately, injuries have since marred his career, keeping him from sustaining production.In 2023, he had a brief resurgence with the Baltimore Ravens, where he had 35 receptions for 565 yards and three touchdowns. Although there have been glimpses of his old playmaking skills, maintaining health and playing at an elite level have continued to be issues in recent years.Odell Beckham Jr.'s inclusion in the suit has tainted his NFL future. Even though he has not been charged, the litigation issues that face him may affect his chances of securing a new contract with a team. At age 31, with his on-field performance consistently in decline and his name now tied to controversy, his career as a professional football player seems to be at a juncture.Also Read: "I am covered by God": Odell Beckham Jr. responds to assault allegations after being named in Diddy’s legal case For many years, Beckham has had quite the résumé to brag about, reaching 575 catches for 7,987 yards and 59 touchdowns. Now, with uncertainty surrounding his longevity, reliability, and currently legality, there's no guarantee if he will ever be afforded a chance to continue adding to that résumé or if the clock is winding down on him in the NFL.
Article Summary: Odell beckham jr. has been named as a defendant in a recently filed case in the northern district of california. The lawsuit also includes popular comedian and online personality druski (drew desbordes), as well as r&b artist jaguar wright. Beckham's purported involvement in the matter has generated widespread public interest.

Article Title: Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends: Release date, rules, and gameplay insights
Article Text:
Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends (Image via Respawn Entertainment)

Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends

What to expect from Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends?



Apex Legends

Three Strikes Mystery Legends

When is Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends releasing?



March 11, 2025 at 10:00 AM (PT)

until March 25, 2025

is a modified version of the original Three Strikes LTM that was first released as part of the Post Malone crossover in Season 19. This is one of the most popular game modes in the Apex Legends community as it features non-stop action with low cooldown times between deaths, despite being in a battle royale match. Players have been asking for a return of this game mode for years and Respawn Entertainment has finally listened.This article will discuss the rules, gameplay, and release date of the upcoming Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends LTM.The rules of Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends are very similar to the original Three Strikes LTM. Teams of three players drop into the map from the drop ship in a battle royale match. Unlike traditional battle royale, however, when a player dies in Three Strikes, they immediately respawn from the drop ship to get right back into the action. This happens thrice, essentially granting the player three lives in a single battle royale match. The game mode also features faster revives and invincibility when knocked.comes with a twist to this intriguing game mode. While in regular three strikes, players choose their legends before the match, in Three Strikes Mystery Legends, a random legend is chosen for the player. Additionally, when a player dies, he respawns with a different legend every time, hence the name ‘Mystery’. One interesting aspect to this mode is that any upgrade to your EVO shield is carried over to the new legend you respawn with, consequently granting you all the unlocked perks of the new legend.This game mode will force players to try out legends that they wouldn’t normally pick. Adapting to different abilities and a good understanding of all the legends will be crucial for success in Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends.While no official announcement has been made on the release of this LTM, trusted leaker @HYPERMYSTx has revealed the release date of Apex Legends Three Strikes Mystery Legends to be on. The LTM will be playableAlso read: Apex Legends Season 25: New Legend, Skirmisher Class Revamp, and Developer Insights Revealed
Article Summary: Apex legends three strikes mystery legends is a modified version of the original three strikes ltm. The game mode was first released as part of the post malone crossover in season 19. It features non-stop action with low cooldown times between deaths, despite being in a battle royale match.

Article Title: “He's one of the rare ones”: NHL insider strongly believes that Brad Marchand is a potential Hall of Famer
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Kyle Bukauskas and Elliotte Friedman examined Brad Marchand's chances for induction into the Hockey Hall of Fame

Trade Deadline Wrap Up Special | 32 Thoughts

NHL insiders Kyle Bukauskas and Elliotte Friedman discussed Brad Marchand's chances of being inducted into the Hockey Hall of Fame during their co-hosting of "32 Thoughts: The Podcast" on Sportsnet. Bukauskas strongly believed that Marchand was a potential Hall of Famer.NHL insiders Kyle Bukauskas and Elliotte Friedman recently examined Brad Marchand's chances for induction into the Hockey Hall of Fame. On Monday's installment of 32 Thoughts: The Podcast on Sportsnet, which they co-host, the two pundits discussed the subject, reviewing the Canadian winger's career and credentials.Bukauskas was especially vocal in his contention that Marchand was bound for a position among hockey's all-time greats, making a staunch claim that the veteran winger had developed a résumé deserving of the sport's highest individual award.“I know, like, there's other players out there that have played 1,000 games and have 1,000 points that aren't in the Hall of Fame," Bukauskas said. “I think you look at the way he impacted the league for all those years in that kind of way, there just wasn't a lot of other players like him.He further added, “There were agitators out there, no question; there were players that could score over his years, absolutely. But to have that complete package, he's one of the rare ones, and I think that has to be factored into the conversation too.”Elliotte Friedman, co-host of Bukauskas, raised the issue due to resistance he received regarding the inclusion of Marchand in the Hall of Fame. “Yes, I'm with you on all this. Like, to me, he is a Hall of Famer,” Friedman said.Brad Marchand spent 16 seasons in the NHL playing for the Boston Bruins after the team drafted him in the 2006 NHL Draft. Throughout his time playing with the club, he emerged as a star player, and in his very first season in the league during the 2010-11 campaign, he helped the Bruins win the Stanley Cup. For his leadership and services, he was appointed captain of the team in 2023. In his time spent with Boston, Marchand played 1,090 games and tallied 422 goals along with 554 assists, placing him at a total point tally of 976.Also Read: “A scumbag”: Brad Marchand a tongue-in-cheek answer when asked about coming back together with Sam Bennett But, in a shock development, Marchand's longtime relationship with the Bruins was dramatically cut short on Friday, which was the last day of the 2024-25 trade deadline. In a shocking development that sent the hockey community reeling, including fans, pundits, and even his own teammates, the veteran forward was traded to the Florida Panthers. The transaction closed the book on an era in Boston and had many wondering what the future holds for the Bruins as well as their former captain.
Article Summary: Nhl insiders kyle bukauskas and elliotte friedman recently examined brad marchand's chances for induction into the hockey hall of fame. On monday's installment of 32 thoughts: the podcast on sportsnet, the two pundits discussed the subject, reviewing the canadian winger's career and credentials.

Article Title: Top 5 Wrestlers Who Represented India in the History of WWE
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty Images)

Great Khali — Dalip Singh Rana

The Great Khali wins the World Heavyweight Championship: SmackDown, July 20, 2007

Jindar Mahal- Yuvraj Singh Dhesi

WWE Champion Jinder Mahal's jaw-dropping entrance: SmackDown LIVE, June 6, 2017

Gama Singh

The Singh Brothers

Brutal Singh Brothers beatdowns: WWE Top 10

Saurav Gurjar

Kickboxer-turned-actor Saurav Gurjar sets sights on WWE ring

Also Read:

India has a rich historical relationship with WWE . Traditional wrestling is considered one of the integral parts of Indian sports. However, over the years, some heavyweight wrestlers have left an indelible mark in the history of entertainment wrestling, particularly in the WWE.Indian wrestlers have contributed and made a lasting impact on the entertainment wrestling industry. They have shown their strength, courage, and resilience and carved their name into glory.Let’s take a look at the top five Indian wrestlers who gained prominence in the history of entertainment wrestling of WWE— The Great Khali is a well-known wrestling figure in modern wrestling history. From WWE dominance to Hollywood and Bollywood ventures, The Great Khali's career has been a whirlwind of star-studded moments. During his WWE days, The Great Khali triumphed over top-tier heavyweight champions like The Undertaker and John Cena The Great Khali is a fascinating and unique figure in WWE history. Khali made his debut on the 7 April episode of SmackDown , attacking The Undertaker and leaving him defenseless during his match with Mark Henry, which caused a no-contest ruling.This debut garnered Khali huge attention as he attacked The Undertaker, one of WWE’s most distinguished figures. The clash strengthened Khali’s position as an unstoppable threat in the early stages of his wrestling career and established the foundation for his future as a major player in the WWE.In 2007, The Great Khali clinched the WWE World Heavyweight Championship. Though he defended the World Heavyweight Championship three times, he was a lackluster champion.Khali also inked his name into glory when he got the WWE Hall of Fame induction in the year 2021, celebrating his contributions, legacy, and influence in the world of wrestling.Jindar Mahal, who is originally known as Yuvraj Singh Dhesi, is an Indian-origin wrestling professional who was born in Canada. Jinder Mahal made his WWE debut in 2010, but it was actually in 2017 that he came into prominence.In 2017, Mahal won the WWE Championship, becoming the second Indian wrestler to hold a major WWE championship. Mahal made his televised WWE debut on the April 29, 2011, episode of SmackDown and also made his debut in NXT in the same year.Jinder Mahal faced top-tier opponents during his prime days in WWE, including Randy Orton, Seth Rollins, The Khali, and Brodus Clay. He was also a part of the faction 3MB which featured fellow wrestlers Heath Slater and Drew McIntyre.Jinder Mahal appeared in WrestleMania 30 in the year 2014, Mahal competed in the André the Giant Memorial battle royal, but was eliminated by Mark Henry. In the same year, WWE released his contract.Gama Singh, born Harjinder Singh, was another Indian wrestling champion who made a name for himself in the world of WWE as early as in 1970s. Though he was an Indo-Canadian wrestler he carved his name into glory and always represented India.Singh began his wrestling career in the 1970s and quickly became one of the most respected wrestlers in the world. Gama Singh made his WWE debut in 1981, and he went on to have a successful career in the company representing India.The Singh brothers, Gurvinder and Harvinder Sihra, are a tag team of Indian descent who was a popular name in the history of WWE. The duo represented India and made their debut in the WWE in 2016, and since then, they have become fan favorites.The Singh Brothers have had numerous memorable moments and action-packed performances in the WWE. They featured in multiple WWE shows like WWE SmackDown, WWE Championship, RAW, and NXT. The Singh Brothers have been involved in a feud between Jinder Mahal and Randy Orton in 2017.They also played a significant role in Mahal's championship reign, often interfering in his matches and helping him retain his title. The Singh Brothers have won the WWE 24/7 Championship multiple times and have had memorable matches against some of the WWE's top tag teams.Saurav, under the new ring name Sanga, was another terrific wrestler in the WWE arena. He is not only a professional wrestler but an Indian TV personality too. Gurjar signed a contract with WWE on 14 January, 2018.He made his first televised appearance as a participant in the Worlds Collide men's battle where Gurjar and Rinku Singh attacked Matt Riddle, with Malcolm Bivens seemingly acting as their manager. Gurjar also featured in the NXT Championship and the NXT North American Championship which he won and retained respectively, at NXT's The Great American Bash.Sanga got promoted to the main roster of the Raw brand in the 2023 WWE Draft. Sanga made his Raw debut on 15 May in a tag team match with Veer defeating local talents like Drake Thompson and Lavar Barbie.Sanga was last seen on the 5 April 2024, episode of Smackdown, where he appeared in the André the Giant Memorial Battle Royal, and was eliminated by the Creed Brothers. In April 2024, Sanga was finally released from WWE.
Article Summary: India has a rich historical relationship with wwe. Traditional wrestling is considered one of the integral parts of indian sports. Over the years, some heavyweight wrestlers have left an indelible mark in the history of entertainment wrestling, particularly in the wwe.

Article Title: LeBron James' wife Savannah James teases glimpse of laid-back luxury car night ride with a short message
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

LeBron James' wife enjoys a quiet evening cruising in a vintage car, sharing a glimpse of her stylish downtime

Savannah James’s instagram story

LeBron James’ wife Savannah James, recently shared a fun moment from her life on Instagram. She posted a video of herself enjoying a calm evening drive around Los Angeles in a cool vintage car from the brand Vintage Broncos. The clip showed her listening to the classic song “Fantasy” by Earth, Wind & Fire. She added a caption saying, “Cute little night ride,” which matched the relaxed mood of her outing.The James family is no stranger to luxury, with an impressive collection of high-end vehicles. LeBron, whose net worth is estimated at $1.2 billion, and Savannah, with her own reported fortune of $100 million, have access to some of the most exclusive cars.Their collection includes a Mercedes-Maybach S600, a Ferrari 599 Fiorano GTO, and a Rolls-Royce Cullinan. In fact, LeBron once received a Rolls-Royce as a birthday gift from fellow NBA star Shaquille O'Neal. While Savannah’s exact car wasn’t confirmed, the Vintage Broncos logo on the steering wheel hinted at the model she was driving.LeBron James, famous for his incredible basketball career and lasting success in the NBA, often shares advice with young athletes. As the league’s all-time top scorer, he encourages players to stay focused on improving their skills rather than chasing fancy things like cars or jewelry. “Those things don’t matter,” he said earlier this year.“Put the game first, then your family, then the game again,” he added.Despite his busy career, LeBron makes time for his family. He and Savannah have been together since high school, and their strong partnership has been a key part of their happiness. Savannah supports LeBron’s career while also building her own projects, showing how they balance their personal and professional lives.Right now, LeBron’s team, the Los Angeles Lakers, is doing well in the NBA season, holding the No. 2 spot in the Western Conference. However, LeBron is taking a short break to recover from a minor groin injury.Also read: Bronny James’ explosive dunk turns heads as he continues to shine for South Bay Lakers amid LeBron James’ Meanwhile, moments like Savannah’s peaceful drive remind fans that even with their glamorous lifestyle, the James family still finds joy in simple, quiet moments together. Their story isn’t just about fame and wealth, it's also about staying grounded, working hard, and cherishing the people you love.
Article Summary: Lebron james' wife savannah shared a video of herself cruising in a vintage car. The james family is no stranger to luxury, with an impressive collection of high-end vehicles. Their collection includes a mercedes-maybach s600, a ferrari 599 fiorano gto, and a rolls-royce cullinan.

Article Title: "Haven’t heard anything": Mike Trout hints uncertainty in joining Team USA for WBC 2026
Article Text:
(Image Source: Trout/Instagram)

Mike Trout’s previous commitment and recent statement

Impact of Mike Trout’s participation on the Team USA

Los Angeles Angels star center fielder Michael Nelson Trout recently expressed uncertainty about his participation in the 2026 World Baseball Classic (WBC). Despite his enthusiasm for the tournament, he revealed that he hasn’t received an invitation yet, leaving fans and analysts wondering about his potential involvement.In March 2023, during the WBC, Mike Trout publicly committed to participating in the 2026 tournament. He stated, “I already told them I’m doing the next one, so I’m already in. If I’m DH-ing, playing left field, whatever they want, I’m in.” This declaration excited fans, as Trout’s involvement adds significant value to Team USA .However, in a recent interview with Barry M. Bloom of Sportico, conducted in March 2025, Trout’s comments suggested a change in circumstances. He mentioned,“I haven’t heard anything yet. Nobody’s brought it up to me, but if they ask, I’m there.”This shift from a firm commitment to awaiting an invitation has raised questions about his participation in the upcoming WBC.Mike Trout ’s involvement in the WBC is significant for Team USA. His leadership and performance in the 2023 tournament were commendable, contributing to the team’s success. His potential absence in 2026 could impact the team’s dynamics and performance.The uncertainty surrounding Trout’s participation also highlights the importance of timely communication between players and team management. Ensuring that key players like Trout are informed and engaged is crucial for Team USA’s preparation and strategy for the 2026 WBC.As the 2026 World Baseball Classic approaches, fans and analysts alike will be keenly observing developments regarding Mike Trout’s involvement. His participation would undoubtedly bolster Team USA’s prospects in the tournament.Also Read: "I'm The Best": Mike Trout Praises Himself As Best Fielder For Angels Ahead Of 2025 Regular Season
Article Summary: Michael nelson trout recently expressed uncertainty about his participation in the 2026 world baseball classic (wbc) despite his enthusiasm for the tournament, he revealed that he hasn’t received an invitation yet. Mike trout ’s involvement in the wbc is significant for team usa.

Article Title: Craig Wolfley is no more: Steelers legend and Broadcaster passes away at 66
Article Text:
Craig Wolfley (via: Getty Images)

Craig Wolfley: A legacy built on passion and perseverance



Tunch Ilkin, Craig Wolfley break down each of the Steelers selections in the 2020 NFL Draft

The voice of the Steelers – Remembering Craig Wolfley’s incredible legacy



The Pittsburgh Steelers family has lost one of its most cherished voices. Craig Wolfley , former offensive lineman and long-time Steelers radio analyst , has passed away at the age of 66. Known for his infectious energy, sharp wit, and deep love for the game, Wolfley was more than just a player, he was a storyteller, mentor, and a true embodiment of Steelers' grit.Born in Buffalo, New York, Wolfley carved his path to football greatness at Syracuse University, where he earned All-American honors and became a key figure in the program’s history. His dominance on the field led to his selection by the Pittsburgh Steelers in the fifth round of the 1980 NFL Draft. Over the next decade, he became a fixture on Pittsburgh’s offensive line under legendary coach Chuck Noll, later closing out his playing career with the Minnesota Vikings.Craig Wolfley’s competitive spirit didn’t end with football. He was a powerhouse in multiple disciplines, earning a black belt in jiu-jitsu, excelling in boxing, and even testing his strength on the global stage, finishing fifth in the 1981 World’s Strongest Man competition. His relentless drive was evident in everything he pursued.Also Read: Bengals address Joe Burrow’s offensive struggles amid uncertainty over Tee Higgins’ future Even after hanging up his cleats, Craig Wolfley remained a staple in Pittsburgh. He transitioned seamlessly into broadcasting, spending nearly two decades as a sideline reporter for Steelers radio. His insightful analysis and humorous takes made him a fan favorite. Alongside his longtime friend and former teammate, Tunch Ilkin , Wolfley co-hosted a popular sports talk show, bringing fans closer to the game with their dynamic chemistry.Beyond football, Craig Wolfley’s heart was with the Pittsburgh community . He and Ilkin worked closely with the Light of Life Rescue Mission, dedicating their time to helping the city’s homeless population. His impact off the field was just as profound as his contributions on it.With Ilkin’s passing in 2021, Wolfley often reflected on their brotherhood. Now, the two Steelers legends are reunited. His loss leaves a void in the hearts of Steelers Nation, but his voice, wisdom, and unwavering passion will be remembered forever.
Article Summary: Craig wolfley, former offensive lineman and long-time steelers radio analyst, has passed away at the age of 66. Known for his infectious energy, sharp wit, and deep love for the game, wolfley was a storyteller, mentor, and embodiment of steelers' grit.

Article Title: Bronny James’ explosive dunk turns heads as he continues to shine for South Bay Lakers amid LeBron James’ NBA controversy
Article Text:
Bronny James. Image via: Getty Images

Bronny James

South Bay Lakers

' dominant 121-103 victory over the Motor City Cruise

Bronny James made a stunning G-Leage performance amid LeBron James’ controversy involving Stephen A. Smith



LeBron James and Bronny James. (Image via Jay LaPrete/AP)

made headlines once again, but this time for all the right reasons. The 20-year-old guard delivered a standout performance in theon Saturday night. His 16-point, five-rebound, six-assist game was made special by a thunderous alley-oop dunk that had fans erupting in excitement. His latest achievement came at a time when his father, LeBron James , was embroiled in a heated confrontation with ESPN’s Stephen A. Smith over criticism of his son’s place in the NBA.Bronny is proving himself in the G-League . The young guard is averaging 21.1 points, 5.4 rebounds, 5.3 assists, and 1.9 steals per game. His dominance on both ends of the floor has made him one of the standout players on the South Bay Lakers' roster.During the matchup against Motor City Cruise, Bronny did it again. On a fast break in the first quarter, teammate Quincy Olivari lobbed a pass from beyond the arc, and Bronny soared to complete a powerful two-handed slam. The highlight-reel dunk electrified the crowd as fans showered praise over the young basketball star.Bronny has been receiving the end of scrutiny over his NBA future. But his performances in the G-League have been acting as a weapon to silence the critics.His father, LeBron James, was dealing with off-court drama that involved his son. The 40-year-old Lakers superstar confronted ESPN analyst Stephen A. Smith after the Lakers' overtime win against the New York Knicks at Madison Square Garden. The confrontation stemmed from Smith’s repeated assertions that Bronny does not belong in the NBA and was only drafted by the Lakers due to LeBron’s influence.“That was LeBron James coming up to me, unexpectedly I might add, to confront me about making sure that I mind what I say about his son,” Smith said on First Take. “Can’t repeat the words because they ain’t suited for FCC airwaves. That’s what he was doing.”Smith had previously criticized LeBron for putting pressure on Bronny to succeed in his shadow, stating, “We all know that Bronny James is in the NBA because of his dad.” However, after their face-to-face exchange, Smith acknowledged LeBron’s love to his son. “That wasn’t a basketball player confronting me. That was a parent. That was a father.”Also Read: Ex-New York Knicks star claims big LeBron James' secret as he is not concerned about the King's latest injury: “He's one of the quickest healers” As for Bronny, he is letting his game do the talking. He has been in his A-game in the G-League, and his fans are hoping that he will soon deliver his standout moment in the main roster. Bronny and his father, James, created an NBA record as they became the first father-son duo to play together in a game in the league on October 22, 2024, during a regular season game against the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Article Summary: Bronny james delivered a standout performance in the south bay lakers' 121-103 victory over the motor city cruise on saturday night. His 16-point, five-rebound, six-assist game was made special by a thunderous alley-oop dunk that had fans erupting in excitement.

Article Title: Champions Trophy: Virat Kohli leads the charge as six Indians make ICC's 'Team of the Tournament'
Article Text:
(PTI Photo)

'Not going anywhere': Rohit Sharma on retirement from ODIs after winning the Champions Trophy

India win Champions Trophy title; Rohit Sharma confirms he's not retiring

Star batter Virat Kohli leads a group of six Indian players selected for the ICC's Champions Trophy 's 12-member 'Team of the Tournament'.India clinched their third Champions Trophy title with a four-wicket victory over New Zealand in Dubai on Sunday. Their previous victories came in 2002 as joint winners and in 2013, with runner-up finishes in 2000 and 2017.The Indian contingent in the team includes Kohli, Shreyas Iyer KL Rahul , Varun Chakravarthy , and Mohammed Shami in the playing XI, while Axar Patel was designated as the 12th man.New Zealand contributed four players to the team, including Player of the Tournament Rachin Ravindra. Mitchell Santner was appointed as the team captain.Afghanistan marked their debut appearance with two players making the team after securing their first-ever ICC Men's Champions Trophy victory.Rachin Ravindra earned his opening position after leading the tournament's run-scoring with 263 runs, including two centuries.Ravindra's performance included a crucial 112 against Bangladesh and a spectacular 108 in the semi-final against South Africa.Ibrahim Zadran joined Ravindra as opener, with the 23-year-old Afghan setting a Champions Trophy record by scoring 177 against England in the group stage.Kohli secured the number three position after accumulating 218 runs at an average of 54.50, finishing fifth in the tournament's run-scoring charts.His tournament highlights included an unbeaten century against Pakistan and a vital 84 in the semi-final victory over Australia.The middle order features Shreyas Iyer and KL Rahul. Iyer topped India's run-scoring with 243 runs, including two half-centuries, while Rahul maintained an impressive average of 140.New Zealand's Glenn Phillips earned the number six spot with his all-round performance, including spectacular catches, a half-century against Pakistan, and crucial wickets against South Africa.Afghanistan's Azmatullah Omarzai demonstrated his all-round capabilities with seven wickets at an average of 20 and 126 runs at 42.00.Captain Mitchell Santner claimed nine wickets throughout the tournament, with crucial dismissals in the final including Shubman Gill and Iyer.Mohammed Shami made a successful comeback from injury, securing his place with nine wickets.Matt Henry, despite missing the final due to a shoulder injury, finished as the leading wicket-taker with 10 wickets at an average of 16.70.Varun Chakravarthy completed the team selection, taking nine wickets in three matches while bowling his full quota in each game.
Article Summary: Virat kohli, shreyas iyer, kl rahul, varun chakravarthy, mohammed shami and axar patel make the 12-member 'team of the tournament' rachin ravindra and ibrahim zadran are the other players to make the team. New zealand contribute four players to the team, including mitchell santner as captain.

Article Title: Will LaMelo Ball play tonight against the Miami Heat? Latest update on the Charlotte Hornets star's injury report (March 10, 2025)
Article Text:
LaMelo Ball has been sidelined (Image via Sam Sharpe/ Imagn Images)

Is LaMelo Ball playing tonight? Charlotte Hornets injury report for tonight’s game against the Miami Heat (March 10, 2025)

Hornets injury report March 10 (Image via NBA)

LaMelo Ball’s influence on the Charlotte Hornets roster

Miami Heat’s injury report for tonight’s game against the Charlotte Hornets (March 10, 2025)

How to watch the Charlotte Hornets play tonight against the Miami Heat (March 10, 2025)

The Charlotte Hornets received a significant boost ahead of their game against the Miami Heat on Monday, March 10, with star guard LaMelo Ball declared fit to play. The matchup, set for 7:30 p.m. ET at the Kaseya Center in Miami, will see Ball return to action as the Hornets look to improve their 15-48 record. LaMelo Ball will be playing tonight against the Miami Heat. Despite Ball’s presence, the Hornets will still be without several key players. Brandon Miller (wrist), Tre Mann (back), and Grant Williams (ACL) remain out for the season, while Josh Okogie (hamstring) is also sidelined. Jusuf Nurkic (neck) is listed as probable and could provide additional support in the frontcourt.Miles Bridges has been a bright spot for Charlotte in recent games, averaging 23.8 points and 8.7 rebounds over the last 20 contests. His performance, combined with Ball’s return, could give the Hornets a fighting chance against a Heat team that has its own injury concerns.Ball, the Hornets’ leading scorer averaging 25.8 points per game, has been a vital part of Charlotte’s offense this season. His return comes at a crucial time for the team, which has struggled offensively, ranking 28th in the league with just 105.3 points per game. Defensively, the Hornets have allowed 113 points per contest, further highlighting their challenges this season. Miami Heat ’s injury report includes seven players, with Dru Smith (Achilles) and Nikola Jovic (hand) ruled out. Alec Burks (back), Duncan Robinson (back), and Haywood Highsmith (knee) are listed as questionable, while Tyler Herro (illness) and Andrew Wiggins (ankle) are probable.The Heat, currently 29-34, have relied heavily on Bam Adebayo and Tyler Herro, who are averaging 21.6 and 21.2 points per game, respectively, over the last 20 games. Miami’s defense, ranked seventh in the league, will look to contain Ball and Bridges as they aim to secure a home victory.With Ball back in the lineup, the Hornets hope to turn their fortunes around, even as they face a tough opponent in the Heat. Fans can catch the action live on FDSSUN and FDSSE or stream the game on Fubo.
Article Summary: Charlotte hornets guard lamelo ball has been declared fit to play against the miami heat. The game is set for 7:30 p.m. Et at the kaseya center in miami. The hornets will still be without several key players, including brandon miller, tre mann, and grant williams.

Article Title: Joel Embiid knee injury: What are the options and possible outcomes for the Sixers' star?
Article Text:
Fans are eager to find out what Joel Embiid's future looks like with the NBA. Source: X

What does Joel Embiid’s year look like in the light of his knee injury?



After participating in only 19 games during the 2024-25 season, Joel Embiid was sidelined for the remainder of the year at the end of February. Despite the pain management strategies and injections employed by the team, his surgically-repaired left knee continued to cause him issues. Now, Embiid is exploring alternative treatments, which may include surgery, as he eyes his return.Embiid underwent surgery to fix a torn meniscus in his left knee on February 2, 2024, a common operation that many NBA players recover from successfully. However, his knee continued to cause him distress more than a year later, which may indicate potential problems. Experts widely believe that if his articular cartilage is damaged, treatment might include less invasive options like orthobiologic injections, such as platelet-rich plasma (PRP), or more extensive procedures like osteochondral implants, where healthy cartilage is transplanted into the affected area.Another possible complication for Embiid is that his repaired meniscus may not be functioning correctly, which could necessitate a meniscal transplant. A good example is Lonzo Ball, the NBA player who successfully returned to play after such a procedure. For Embiid, the recovery might prove more challenging since Ball is physically bigger.A major surgery also takes a mental and emotional toll on an athlete. Embiid himself acknowledged the emotional hardship before the season in an interview. "You’re on your way to accomplish a lot of good things, and then just like that someone falls on your knee. I don’t have any explanation for why it was so tough, but it just was ... Mentally depressing, physically your body not responding the way it should."However, assuming no further setbacks, Embiid could potentially play for several more years. ESPN's Shams Charania reported Sunday that the Sixers and Embiid are “consulting doctors and considering alternative options on his injured knee.In the last two losses for the Sixers, Embiid has scored 29 points while shooting 7-for-22. During Saturday's game against Brooklyn, he did not play in the fourth quarter, with Guerschon Yabusele taking over the center position during the team's comeback effort.
Article Summary: Joel embiid underwent surgery to fix a torn meniscus in his left knee on february 2, 2024. His knee continued to cause him distress more than a year later, which may indicate potential problems. Experts widely believe that if his articular cartilage is damaged, treatment might include less invasive options.

Article Title: Throwback: When Kevin Durant’s controversial comments on India caused outrage and led to an apology
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty)

When Kevin Durant’s Comments On India Sparked Widespread Criticism And He Had To Later Apologise For His Insensitive Comments



My India Trip / Taj Mahal, Guinness World Record, Kevin Durant Charity Foundation

Kevin Durant , one of the most popular and talented players in the National Basketball Association, had found himself involved in a huge controversy after his controversial comments on visiting India went viral. Back in 2017, the Phoenix Suns ’ player had come to India to help spread the growth of basketball in the country. However, his comments about India was not well received by his fans.After Kevin Durant went back to the United States, in an interview with The Athletic, he reflected on his experience in India. He said, “I'm thinking I'm going to be around palaces and royalty and gold — basically thought I was going to Dubai. Then when I landed there, I saw the culture and how they live and it was rough.”Kevin Durant added, “It's a country that's 20 years behind in terms of knowledge and experience…Just a bunch of underprivileged people there and they want to learn how to play basketball.”Kevin Durant’s comments about India sparked widespread criticism back then, as many of his fans were furious at his reply.A few days later, Kevin Durant apologised for his comments on India. He issued a statement on social media that read as, "Sorry that my comments about India were taken out of context. I'm grateful for the time I've got to spend there and I'm really pissed about how my comments came off…”He added, “I spoke about the difference between my imagination and reality there in Delhi…”In 2017, when Kevin Durant came to India, he made a Guiness World Record when he hosted more than 3000 children for the “largest basketball lesson”. These children were from the Reliance Foundation Jr. NBA Program.Kevin Durant’s 2017 trip to India was also just days after he led his former team, the Golden State Warriors to their second NBA championship.Kevin Durant stayed with the Golden State Warriors till 2019 and then signed with the Brooklyn Nets and stayed with the team until 2023.In 2023, the Brooklyn Nets traded Kevin Durant to the Phoenix Suns and he has stayed with the team ever since.Also Read : Carmelo Anthony spills on a wild night of partying with Kevin Hart and Will Packer that nearly derailed a major film shoot
Article Summary: Kevin durant came to india to help spread the growth of basketball in the country. His comments about india was not well received by his fans. A few days later, kevin durant apologised for his comments on india. He issued a statement on social media that read as, "sorry that my comments were taken out of context"

Article Title: “A hot date night in NYC”: Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce spotted together for the first time since Super Bowl LVIII
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce stepped out for a date night



Following a devastating loss to the Philadelphia Eagles during Super Bowl LIX , Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce heavily contemplated hanging up his cleats. Nevertheless, after careful consideration, the 35-year-old has decided to stick around and will take to the field again for the 2025 NFL season . Kelce, one of the driving forces behind the Chiefs' success throughout the years, is still one of the league's most dominant tight ends. His return is a huge plus for Kansas City as they try to bounce back from their Super Bowl defeat and make another championship push.Travis Kelce, a 35-year-old Kansas City Chiefs tight end, will return to the NFL for the 2025 season after contemplating retirement following the team's Super Bowl LIX loss. "I got a bad taste in my mouth for how I ended the year and how well I was playing and how accountable I was for the people around me," Kelce said on his New Heights podcast.He further added, "I feel like there’s a responsibility in me to play out the contract that I initially signed, to give Kansas City and the Chiefs organization everything that I got, and that’s what I’m gonna do, man."Kelce criticized the Super Bowl defeat as an "all-time low," while Taylor Swift's had a bad experience, with the Eagles-heavy crowd booing her during her jumbotron appearance. Kelce and Swift have maintained a low profile since the Super Bowl, with a source revealing they went on an international vacation last month, but the location remains unnamed.“Taylor and Travis have stepped out for a date night since returning to the US but went unnoticed when they did so," the source added. "They weren’t photographed or anything, and enjoyed a low-key night out on the town together.”Deuxmoi reported that Kelce and 14-time Grammy winner were spotted outside Los Angeles on March 8, with details on their date of birth kept confidential for privacy's sake. "Travis is just as loved-up as ever," Deuxmoi reported, noting how he wears a good luck charm with a nod to Swift while he playing football. "It’s only fitting they take some necessary R&R to be a normal couple."The source further added, "So whether we next see Taylor and Travis on a hot date night in NYC or another romantic getaway, they’re not going anywhere. Call it what you want, but there’s absolutely zero trouble in paradise for T.S. and T.K."Also Read: “Taylor is really gripped by fear”: Taylor Swift is anxious as Travis Kelce deliberates return for 2025 NFL season With Travis Kelce and Taylor Swift each having multiple nominations for the 2025 iHeartRadio Music Awards, fans are holding their breath to know if the couple will officially make their much-awaited red carpet arrival at the March 17 event. The couple has been one of the top subjects of discussion, and appearing together in public at such a glamorous ceremony would be a huge moment for their supporters.
Article Summary: Travis kelce will return to the nfl for the 2025 season. The 35-year-old contemplated retirement following the team's super bowl lix loss. Kelce and taylor swift have maintained a low profile since the super bowl. The couple were spotted outside la on march 8.

Article Title: “Insufficient respect”: Pat McAfee says he feels underappreciated by the NFL, prompting him to step away from his ESPN talk show
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Pat McAfee has decided to distance himself from his ESPN talk show 'The Pat McAfee Show’

Pat McAfee, a popular football talk show host, has decided to distance himself from his ESPN talk show ' The Pat McAfee Show ' due to concerns about the league's lack of respect for him. After signing with ESPN for a five-year $85 million deal, McAfee's coverage of the 2025 NFL Draft in Green Bay was eagerly anticipated by NFL fans.Since Pat McAfee signed with ESPN, The Pat McAfee Show has taken off, becoming the go-to source for football enthusiasts. Although he already had a solid following, signing a whopping five-year, $85 million deal with ESPN provided him with an even greater platform—an offer he could not refuse.Now, two years into his relationship with the network, most NFL fans were looking forward to McAfee's coverage of the 2025 NFL Draft in Green Bay. But the 37-year-old has made the unexpected move to opt out of covering the event. His reason? McAfee feels the league doesn't treat him with the respect he feels he deserves.While he has been a vocal presence in football media, McAfee has suggested that he feels underappreciated by the NFL, which prompted him to step away from the draft. His lack of participation will certainly be missed, as he has provided a certain level of energy and perspective to previous events. While he hasn't eliminated the possibility of future work with the league, at this point, it seems he's making a point until he feels appropriately acknowledged.“It is not just the insufficient respect…It is basically the overall relationship,” a frustrated McAfee said. “People do not know, I have paid the NFL millions and millions of dollars for years, so that I can get rights…for highlights and plays for our show.”Pat McAfee is teasing his biggest event yet, revealing that it will be a whole moment. McAfee has provided cryptic hints about a night full of absolute madness, indicating that this will be a memorable event. “Millions and millions of dollars will be given away that evening,” he said like it was just another Tuesday.To date, ESPN has been utterly silent on the issue—no public pronouncements, no disciplinary measures, nothing. The network's inaction has served only to stir up speculation, with fans and pundits alike questioning whether McAfee will be punished at all or if this too will blow over as the next major sports tale takes its turn in the limelight.Yet Pat McAfee's resignation from the NFL Draft has opened up a much bigger debate. There are those who say that personalities on television, particularly those who have large fan bases, can say what's on their mind without worrying about the consequences. Others feel that collaborating with large networks such as ESPN is predicated on some understanding—one being holding up a degree of professionalism in speaking about league issues.Also Read: “Biggest influence on my life”: Travis Kelce hints at extending career alongside coach Andy Reid in emotional message Wherever individuals may be, one thing is certain—McAfee excels at staying in the limelight. His fearless attitude and inclination to question the norm have always served to make him a divisive personality in sports media. And honestly, this will likely not be the first or the last time he generates a fiery controversy or finds himself at the center of the internet's newest controversy.
Article Summary: Pat mcafee has decided to distance himself from his espn talk show 'the pat mcafee show' his reason? Mcafee feels the league doesn't treat him with the respect he feels he deserves. The 37-year-old signed a five-year, $85 million deal with espn two years ago.

Article Title: NBA Trade Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers might reunite with $3 million shooting guard before playoffs to support LeBron James and Luka Doncic
Article Text:
Luka Doncic and LeBron James (Image via Getty Images)

Los Angeles Lakers forward LeBron James, left, passes as teammate guard Luka Doncic looks on during the first half of an NBA basketball game against the Utah Jazz, Monday, Feb. 10, 2025, in Los Angeles. (Image via AP Photo/Mark J. Terrill)

The Los Angeles Lakers are making strategic moves as they gear up for the playoffs, with reports indicating that Jordan Goodwin ’s two-way contract will soon be converted into a standard NBA deal. This decision comes as the team continues its impressive run, winning seven straight games and 18 of their last 21. To make room for Goodwin, the Lakers are likely to waive either Cam Reddish or Alex Len, with Reddish being the more probable candidate.Jordan Goodwin, a 26-year-old guard, has quickly become a valuable asset for the Los Angeles Lakers since joining the team in early February. Over eight games, he has averaged 6.1 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 1.0 assist in 16.9 minutes per game. Even though Goodwin's progress has been hindered by a recent injury to his right ankle, his accomplishments have not gone ignored. Head coach JJ Redick has been very complimentary to him and has called him an important rotation player.Jovan Buha of The Athletic reports that in order to optimize financial flexibility, the Los Angeles Lakers are anticipated to convert Goodwin's deal as late as feasible. "I do expect him to be converted at the end of the season as late as possible, and then be on the playoff roster. ... He's kind of become the 9th man, and you could argue that depending on the night and depending on the matchup, he should be like the 8th man," Buha said on his podcast . He also hinted at a potential multi-year deal for Goodwin in the future, stating, "I think he's going to get a multi-year contract, longer-term later in the season."Jordan Goodwin’s journey to the Lakers began after they waived Armel Traore to open a roster spot. A four-year NBA veteran, he has previously played for Washington, Phoenix, and Memphis, holding career averages of 6.4 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 2.6 assists across 128 games. His versatility and defensive prowess have made him a reliable option off the bench.Also read: NBA Buyout Rumors: Los Angeles Lakers could bag $33 million ex-Toronton Raptors star to bolster squad's defensive end As the Los Angeles Lakers continue their push for playoff success, the decision to convert Jordan Goodwin’s contract reflects their commitment to strengthening their roster. With Cam Reddish likely on the way out, the team is betting on Goodwin’s ability to contribute in high-pressure situations. Fans will be watching closely to see how this move impacts the Lakers’ postseason aspirations.
Article Summary: Jordan goodwin, a 26-year-old guard, has quickly become a valuable asset for the los angeles lakers since joining the team in early february. Over eight games, he has averaged 6.1 points, 3.8 rebounds, and 1.0 assist in 16.9 minutes per game. To make room for goodwin, the lakers are likely to waive either cam reddish or alex len, with reddish the more probable candidate.
